scripts.dev: (command -v poetry >/dev/null && poetry run python -m uvicorn src.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000) || python -m uvicorn src.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.start: (command -v poetry >/dev/null && poetry run python -m uvicorn src.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000) || python -m uvicorn src.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.test: (command -v poetry >/dev/null && poetry run python -m pytest) || python -m pytest
scripts.test:unit: (command -v poetry >/dev/null && poetry run python -m pytest -m unit) || python -m pytest -m unit
scripts.test:integration: (command -v poetry >/dev/null && poetry run python -m pytest -m integration) || python -m pytest -m integration
scripts.test:coverage: (command -v poetry >/dev/null && poetry run python -m pytest --cov=src --cov-report=html --cov-report=xml) || python -m pytest --cov=src --cov-report=html --cov-report=xml
scripts.test:watch: (command -v poetry >/dev/null && poetry run python -m pytest -f) || python -m pytest -f
scripts.lint: (command -v poetry >/dev/null && poetry run python -m ruff check src tests) || python -m ruff check src tests
scripts.lint:fix: (command -v poetry >/dev/null && poetry run python -m ruff check --fix src tests) || python -m ruff check --fix src tests
scripts.format: (command -v poetry >/dev/null && poetry run python -m black src tests && poetry run python -m isort src tests) || (python -m black src tests && python -m isort src tests)
scripts.type-check: (command -v poetry >/dev/null && poetry run python -m mypy src) || python -m mypy src
